cards.name: Shieldon
cards.description: Shieldon, a curious Pokemon with a white armor-like shell, is often found in grassy fields basking in the warm sun. With its powerful Slam attack, Shieldon easily defends itself from any potential predators. During the day, Shieldon can be seen roaming around, exploring its surroundings with a fondness for new experiences.
cards.image_prompt: Shieldon::0 a special neutral-type pokemon::1.8, wearing white armor, in a field environment, soft ambient light, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
